edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate

Class SphinxAsciiLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.Sphinx3Loader
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.SphinxAsciiLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loader, Configurable

    public class SphinxAsciiLoader
extends Sphinx3Loader
    Sphinx loader that loads ASCII versions.
